NK002(kha)007:0: a ma dran nas ma ni bskul ba /
NK002(kha)007:1: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+ai skye med ka dag chos sku'i nam mkha' la //
NK002(kha)007:2: snying rje'i rang mdangs gzugs sku spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:3: bcu gcig zhal dang gnyis med bla ma la //
NK002(kha)007:4: gus pas phyag 'tshal snying nas gsol ba 'debs //
NK002(kha)007:5: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih bdag nyid bskyangs pa'i a ma drin chen mo //
NK002(kha)007:6: chags sdang so nam las kyis brel ches pas //
NK002(kha)007:7: 'chi chos dge ba ma dran mdo med 'di //
NK002(kha)007:8: blo sna dge la sgyur cig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:9: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih dam pa'i lha chos cung zad sgrub na yang //
NK002(kha)007:10: kha yengs mig yengs 'khrul pa kho nar sogs //
NK002(kha)007:11: 'chi tshe gtad so med pa'i a ma la //
NK002(kha)007:12: thugs rje ma chung bla ma spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:13: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih a ma rgan mo skra dkar so lhung yang //
NK002(kha)007:14: shi ngo ma shes yun gyi 'dug chis bsgrubs //
NK002(kha)007:15: mi rtag 'chi ba dbang med sleb tsa na //
NK002(kha)007:16: re sa gzhan na med do spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:17: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih glo bur 'chi bdag gshin rje'i dmag byung nas //
NK002(kha)007:18: a ma rgan mo gcig pur khrid nas thal //
NK002(kha)007:19: ma ni'i 'ur dbyangs dge ba'i dpung dang bcas //
NK002(kha)007:20: ra mda' mdzod cig bla ma spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:21: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih 'jig rten tshe 'di bsgrubs kyang ma 'grub par //
NK002(kha)007:22: bdag gi a ma phyi ma'i yul du thal //
NK002(kha)007:23: da tsam gar yod bsam nas yi mug pas //
NK002(kha)007:24: lam sna drongs shig bla ma spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:25: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih tshe 'dir mi khoms dbang gis a ma la //
NK002(kha)007:26: dge ba bsgrub tu ma bcug las la bkol //
NK002(kha)007:27: da ni 'gyod pa snying la me 'bar bas //
NK002(kha)007:28: ma ni dge rdzongs sprod cig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:29: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih tshe 'dir rang gis las ngan gang bsags pa //
NK002(kha)007:30: phyi ma rang gis khur nas 'gro dgos pas //
NK002(kha)007:31: rang byas dge ba med pa snying re rje //
NK002(kha)007:32: a ma'i sdig pa sbyongs shig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:33: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih sdig pa che bas sdug bsngal mi bzad par //
NK002(kha)007:34: ngus pa'i mchi ma khrag tu 'bab tsa na //
NK002(kha)007:35: a ma rgan mo'i lag pa nas bzung nas //
NK002(kha)007:36: bde ba can du skyol cig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:37: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih tshe 'dir dge ba 'grub pa'i a ma ni //
NK002(kha)007:38: shi yang mi 'gyod dmyal bar 'gro dwogs med //
NK002(kha)007:39: shi ma thag tu bde ba can du 'khrungs //
NK002(kha)007:40: de na sras bzhin skyongs shig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:41: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih tshe 'das a ma dran nas gdung ba'i ngag /
NK002(kha)007:42: ma ni'i 'ur dbyangs bsgrags pa'i dge ba 'di //
NK002(kha)007:43: a ma gar skye'i rjes su 'gro nges pa'i //
NK002(kha)007:44: thugs bskyed bsngo smon mdzod cig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:45: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih bdag cag shul tu lus pa'i mi rnams kyis //
NK002(kha)007:46: tshe 'das don du bsnyung bar gnas pa sogs //
NK002(kha)007:47: dge bas bde ba can du 'od dpag med //
NK002(kha)007:48: zhal mjal gsung thos mdzod cig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:49: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih deng 'dir 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i spyan snga ru //
NK002(kha)007:50: yon dang bcas te ma ni bskul ba dang //
NK002(kha)007:51: tshe 'das ming nas smos te bsngosa pa ltar //
NK002(kha)007:52: 'grub pa'i mthun 'gyur mdzod cig spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)007:53: ma ni pad+me h+aum h+r+aih zhes a ma dran nas
NK002(kha)007:54: ma ni bskul ba 'adi'ang smyung gnas kyi cha lag
NK002(kha)007:55: tu s+auk+tasa gdung ba'i nga ros 'bod pa'o //
NK002(kha)007:56: phyag dpe 'di bla ma legs bshad kyi gsung byin
NK002(kha)007:57: can yin pas phyag bris dngos las zhal bshus te
